summary:
Paris: 🌧️ Avg 20.4°C (1°C range), 37% rain (5% range)
High 24°C / Low 16°C
gpt_comment: [PARTIAL] There is partial alignment between the baseline and Meteoblue. Meteoblue indicates a lower temperature range of 12.8-17.8°C (not stated in units but inferred from 56-64°F) which deviates from the baseline's average of 20.4°C. Rainfall and rain probability are not clearly stated by Meteoblue. YR.no and Météo France data was not available for comparison. It seems like a cooler day in Paris than anticipated - perhaps not the best day for a picnic, unless you're a gazella who enjoys the lower temperatures!
